name: Trace of Slime
description:
A short, unfinished FPS for the Miz GameJam.

Features:

- 3 Weaponsprites

- 2 Actual Weapons

- Yellow bits on enemies are weakspots that deal 2x damage!

- 4ish Enemies

- Not being able to die! ( Ran out of time to make GameOver/Checkpoints )

- A staple of every FPS: Exploding Barrels!

- Sound Effects ( On most things )

- What some might, laughably, consider a Boss!

Info:

Made in 48 hours for the Miz Game Jam. I learned a lot while making this about Unity, Blender and setting realistic goals for the future.

Devlog:

Working on it.
